sentences.sentence: A genus of passerine birds including the meadowlarks.
sentences.translation: 包含草地鹨在内的雀形目鸟的一个属。

sentences.sentence: A bird, especially one of the suborder Oscines of passerine birds, having a melodious song or call.
sentences.translation: 一种鸟，尤其指雀形目鸟中鸣禽亚目中的一种，其歌声或叫声宛啭动听。

sentences.sentence: Any of various passerine chiefly tropical old world songbirds of the family pycnonotidae having grayish or brownish plumage.
sentences.translation: 鹎一种雀形目鸟类，主要指东半球热带的鹎科的鸣鸟，有灰色的或褐色的羽衣。
